instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]Rules regarding Schematic and board Views sharing
threads.message:
Hey People 

I imagine there are some rules regarding sharing schematics and such ? Reading the forum rules didn't include any information on the topic, so I am just making sure. 

I figure sharing on threads wouldn't be the way to go  :) 

Sorry if I missed this somewhere and thanks in advance. 

Best Regards
Holmenlund

threads.title: [SOLVED]Rules regarding Schematic and board Views sharing
threads.message: Don't share them on the forum. Whatever you do outside here to contact people is outside of my control.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Rules regarding Schematic and board Views sharing
threads.message: does 'A company' actually go after people that have the schematics?

threads.title: [SOLVED]Rules regarding Schematic and board Views sharing
threads.message:
No idea, if you want your own website at risk of being shut down then go ahead and put them online for everyone to download.
It is proprietary copyrighted material and won't be shared here, case closed.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Rules regarding Schematic and board Views sharing
threads.message: i dont share them, I paid to have all of them
